**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 594 4.0 **Usage** held in 1 hand --- This ornately designed metal staff shines with precious inlays of gold. When you Cast a Spell from the staff, the illusory image of something you desire flashes across its surface. While wielding the staff, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to checks to identify illusion magic. **Activate** Cast a Spell; **Effect** You expend a number of charges from the staff to cast a spell from its list. **Craft Requirements** Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells. Staff of Illusion **Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 595 4.0 **Price** 230 gp **Bulk** 1 ---
  • **Cantrip** [_ghost sound_](/Spells.aspx?ID=132)
  • **1st** [_illusory disguise_](/Spells.aspx?ID=159), [_illusory object_](/Spells.aspx?ID=160)
  • **2nd** [_illusory creature_](/Spells.aspx?ID=158), [_item facade_](/Spells.aspx?ID=166), [_ventriloquism_](/Spells.aspx?ID=356)
Staff of Illusion (Greater) **Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 595 4.0 **Price** 900 gp **Bulk** 1 ---
  • **3rd** _illusory disguise_, _item facade_
  • **4th** _illusory creature_, [_veil_](/Spells.aspx?ID=355)
Staff of Illusion (Major) **Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 595 4.0 **Price** 4,000 gp **Bulk** 1 ---
  • **5th** [_illusory scene_](/Spells.aspx?ID=161), _veil_
  • **6th** [_hallucination_](/Spells.aspx?ID=144), [_mislead_](/Spells.aspx?ID=199)
name: Staff of Illusion (Major)
